column3: CPU 4122 Bassetlaw District Council - Public Health Funerals
column4: Public health funeral services to be delivered on behalf of Bassetlaw District Council.

column3: CPU 4138 Car Park Construction Work, Signage & Footpath
column4:
Nottingham City Council is undertaking this procurement exercise on behalf of Ashfield District Council. Ashfield District Council are the Contracting Authority; and will be entering into the contract with the appointed supplier. Ashfield District Council is seeking tenders for the construction of a Car Park, Footpath and site signage across the Mill Waters Project Site. 
The Authority's detailed requirements are set out in the Specification document titled HF Car Park Access Specification.

column3: CPU 4072 Short Breaks for Disabled Children
column4:
Nottingham City Council is seeking tenders from sufficiently experienced and qualified providers to establish framework contracts for the provision of short breaks services for disabled children to be delivered in Nottingham.
Lot 1 - Group Activities - provision of a range of local short breaks group activities, which can include evening activities such as youth groups, weekend activities and school holiday clubs.  We are seeking up to six providers with a total annual contract value of up to £104,000 per annum across the contract, plus the option of one-off advance funding of up to £10,000 per provider for the first year.
Lot 2 - One to One Support - for children / young people with relatively low levels of assessed need.  We are seeking up to four providers with a total annual value of up to £28,000 per annum across the contract.
The call off from the framework will be based on the needs of the citizen and citizen choice.  The contract duration will be for four years and is anticipated to commence in October 2020.

This contract will be let under the Light Touch Regime of the Public Contract Regulations 2015.

Application documents can be downloaded from www.eastmidstenders.org.  Closing date for receipt of completed Application Forms is 12 noon 4 September 2020.

Design, installation and testing of buried district heating pipework in carriageway, footway and Bio City property on City Link, Lace Way, Plough Lane and Evelyn Street.
Design, installation and testing of above ground district heating pipework into 2 No. plant rooms and once covered storage area within the Bio City complex of buildings.
Construction of 1 No. reinforced concrete plinth within the Innovation Building plant room to support the new heat exchange unit.
Taking delivery of 3 No. Client designed and purchased skid units, uploading and safe storage. Dismantling of two of these skid units and transporting into the respective plant rooms, Innovation and Laurus, before reassembling and insulating. The third, for the Stuart Adams building can be installed within the covered storage area without dismantling.
Installation of un-tensioned safety fencing within the loading bay adjacent to the Laurus Building, to protect the above ground heating pipes.
Start on site is due to commence no later than 1st October 2020 the latest that the Client will permit a shutdown of the district heating system for the connection works is 30th November 2020. All works should be completed no later than 4 weeks after this date, Or 4 weeks following delivery of the heat exchange units to the Principle Contractor, whichever is the later.

column3: CPU4168 - Servicing, Repairs and Maintenance of Sprinklers Systems & Gas Fire Suppression Systems
column4: Nottingham City Council is seeking tenders from suitably experienced and qualified entities for the provision of repairs, maintenance and minor works to sprinklers and gas fire suppression systems located within their portfolio of buildings to include: - Planned Maintenance and Remedial Works - Reactive Maintenance - Delivery of minor improvement works To the following assets: i) Gas Fire Suppression ii) Sprinkler Systems. Tender documents published and available on www.eastmidstenders.org.
column9: Repair and maintenance services of firefighting equipment
